forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere dances between a gentle clarity and a subtle murkiness, suggestive of the marine layer that often embraces this coastal haven. The temperature dips to a comfortable chill, reminiscent of a late spring night, hovering around 51 degrees, with a whispering wind nudging through at around 7 to 14 mph. A touch of clouds adds character to the sky, hinting at the possibility of a tranquil, mildly breezy evening ahead. 

Looking towards tomorrow, the forecast reveals a promise of sunshine breaking through, although the cool fingertips of the west-southwest wind may temper the warmth of the day, peaking near 61 degrees before it gracefully descends to about 59 in the afternoon. With these conditions in play, dressing in layers is wise—perhaps a light jacket or a cardigan to ward off the evening chill, complemented by comfortable shoes perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero. The soft glow of this vibrant city at dusk invites a casual exploration; a quiet saunter down to the piers or a leisurely visit to a local café, allowing one to indulge in the calm of the twilight hours enveloped by the sounds of gentle waves lapping against the shore.
